name: Pankkake v1
description:
Version 1 of Pankkake!

Use the left and right arrow keys to collect ingredients that are presented on the top right of the screen. Avoid wrong ingredients, as they will deduct your health bar. Every time you collect an aphrodisiac ingredient, your sexy bar increases.

Once your sexy bar is full, you get access to the Sexy Bonus round. Press the up key to shoot cream on stacks of pancakes to get easy bonus points!
